title: Character guides
data:
**This article contains advice from other players, which may be subjective, outdated, inaccurate or ill-advised.** Take advice as you see fit, and read at your own risk!

New players should start with the general [Walkthrough](/Walkthrough "Walkthrough"). After that, please browse our [strategy guides](/Strategy_guides "Strategy guides") for more general advice, and review the [early game](/Early_Game_Tips "Early Game Tips"), [mid-game](/Mid_Game_Tips "Mid Game Tips"), and [late game](/Late_Game_Tips "Late Game Tips") tips.

*Authors: You are responsible for maintaining your guide. Failure to do so will result in your guide moved to the [archives](/Outdated_character_guide_archives "Outdated character guide archives") until it has been updated.*

## Updated

**Felid**

- FeSu:
  - [Onei's Velvet-Pawed Path to Immortality Walkthrough - FeSu^Kikubaaqudgha/Jiyva](/Onei%27s_Velvet-Pawed_Path_to_Immortality_Walkthrough_-_FeSu%5EKikubaaqudgha/Jiyva "Onei's Velvet-Pawed Path to Immortality Walkthrough - FeSu^Kikubaaqudgha/Jiyva") \[Advanced] (0.32)

**Minotaur**

- MiFi
  - [H's Minotaur Fighter Guide](/H%27s_Minotaur_Fighter_Guide "H's Minotaur Fighter Guide") \[Beginner] (0.31)

**Troll**

- TrFi:
  - [Repo Troll Guide, TrFi^Wu Jian](/Repo_Troll_Guide,_TrFi%5EWu_Jian "Repo Troll Guide, TrFi^Wu Jian") \[Beginner] (0.32)

## Older Versions

*Some of these guides are severely out of date. They still have information that is generally useful, but be aware of references to outdated things.*

- [Onei's 3-rune Interdimensional Feline Kidnapping Walkthrough - FeSu^Gozag/Jiyva](/Onei%27s_3-rune_Interdimensional_Feline_Kidnapping_Walkthrough_-_FeSu%5EGozag/Jiyva "Onei's 3-rune Interdimensional Feline Kidnapping Walkthrough - FeSu^Gozag/Jiyva") (0.30)
- [Onei’s 15-rune Travel Guide on Thrilling Ventures in the Demonic Funhouses - FeSu^Jiyva](/Onei%E2%80%99s_15-rune_Travel_Guide_on_Thrilling_Ventures_in_the_Demonic_Funhouses_-_FeSu%5EJiyva "Onei’s 15-rune Travel Guide on Thrilling Ventures in the Demonic Funhouses - FeSu^Jiyva") (0.29)
- [Majang's Caster Walk-Through](/Majang%27s_Caster_Walk-Through "Majang's Caster Walk-Through") (0.20)
- [Buddy23Lee's Mummy Fighter guide](/Buddy23Lee%27s_Mummy_Fighter_guide "Buddy23Lee's Mummy Fighter guide") (0.14)

For more older guides, see the [Character Guide archives](/Outdated_character_guide_archives "Outdated character guide archives").

html:
Character guides

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
This article contains advice from other players, which may be subjective, outdated, inaccurate or ill-advised. Take advice as you see fit, and read at your own risk!

New players should start with the general Walkthrough. After that, please browse our strategy guides for more general advice, and review the early game, mid-game, and late game tips.

Authors: You are responsible for maintaining your guide. Failure to do so will result in your guide moved to the archives until it has been updated.

Updated

Felid

  • FeSu:
    • Onei's Velvet-Pawed Path to Immortality Walkthrough - FeSu^Kikubaaqudgha/Jiyva [Advanced] (0.32)

Minotaur

  • MiFi
    • H's Minotaur Fighter Guide [Beginner] (0.31)

Troll

  • TrFi:
    • Repo Troll Guide, TrFi^Wu Jian [Beginner] (0.32)

Older Versions

Some of these guides are severely out of date. They still have information that is generally useful, but be aware of references to outdated things.

  • Onei's 3-rune Interdimensional Feline Kidnapping Walkthrough - FeSu^Gozag/Jiyva (0.30)
  • Onei’s 15-rune Travel Guide on Thrilling Ventures in the Demonic Funhouses - FeSu^Jiyva (0.29)
  • Majang's Caster Walk-Through (0.20)
  • Buddy23Lee's Mummy Fighter guide (0.14)


For more older guides, see the Character Guide archives.
